name: KRDS
overview:
Incorporated in 2008, KRDS is the leading Facebook marketing agency in France and was appointed “Preferred Developer Consultant” by Facebook in early 2010. KRDS has already branched out to Spain, Italy, Belgium, Switzerland and India.

Thus far (feb 2011), KRDS has worked with close to 100 brands, including Danone, TF1 (the number 1 rated TV channel in Europe), BNP Paribas, The Coca Cola Company, Renault, L’Oreal, Louis Vuitton, Dior, Air France, Gazetta Dello Sport, Radio Television Espanola.

Among KRDS’ achievements: in 2009 KRDS created and developed the application “For A New Capitalism” for Danone which was awarded the Grand Prize by Facebook at the French App Contest; in january 2011, KRDS helped Marmara, a French tour operator, gain more 100,000 fans in 7 days.

KRDS’ expertise notably comprises of application conception and development, fanbase growth and Facebook advertising.

KRDS regularly talks at conferences in Europe, like LeWeb in Paris (2008, 2009), or IAB conference (Greece, 2010). KRDS is a regular speaker as well at Facebook Developer Garages organized in France. In November 2010, KRDS organized its own Facebook marketing garage in Paris with the manager of the French Facebook bureau as a guest speaker. The event was attended by more than 100 top French advertisers.

external_links.title: KRDS is awarded the Grand Prize at the 2009 French app contest by Facebook
